subject: NCAA Ice Hockey Championships
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The superlative performance of Boston College goalie Parker Milner, who made 27 saves, helped the top-seeded Eagles fend off Ferris State for the Frozen Four title.
snippet: The superlative performance of Boston College goalie Parker Milner, who made 27 saves, helped the top-seeded Eagles fend off Ferris State for the Frozen Four title.
